name: Who wants to get fixed?
description:
Activate fullscreen mode to play

Their lives depend on you!

"Stores are running out of parts and lifeguard mechanics have moved out of town with no way to work. Good thing your family makes parts, isn't it?"

Attend the robots requests grabbing the tools in your workshop and fix the robots as fas as you can. Watch out for not being late or giving them the wrong treatment because it's a delicate life or death situation.

Submission for The Pacifist Jam (Honest Jam IV)
